## Food and Juice Preferences of Participants of Different Ages

```{r}

choice <- function(what , age){
  ggplot(fixed_data, aes_string(x = what, y = age, fill = what)) +
  geom_boxplot(col = "royalblue4", size = 0.7) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  ylab(sub(" ", " ", age)) +
  xlab(sub(" ", " ", what)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("skyblue2", "mediumpurple")) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))}

choice("Food", "Age")
choice("Juice", "Age")
```

```{r}
both <- choice("Food", "Age")
  choice("Juice", "Age")
x <- "both"

if(x == "food"){
  choice("Food", "Age")
} else if(x == "drink"){
  choice("Juice", "Age")
} else {
  both
}

```
